name: Beach Struggle
description:
Submission for I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again) game jam

Control:- A/D - Left/Right Movement Space - Shoot

Crabs have attacked a city full of ducks and you are a BUBBLE MAN, who sprays bubbles to save the city.

If more crabs escape to city, then ducks fly by.

Music:-
